data.name: Medieval Kingdom Wars - Royal Blood
data.detailed_description:
It's time to take your place on the throne!

Only those of Royal Blood can undertake the King’s Campaign. Defend your mighty nation from enemies near and far, build your towns and cities into impregnable bastions and economic powerhouses, and expand your realm by claiming all that is yours by right of your royal blood.

Keep your vassal lords loyal by showering them with gifts or cowing them the might of your armies. Call your vassals to war, order them to send armies, pay tribute and carry out efforts to win allies and destroy your enemies!

The throne is yours, what will you do with it?

Additions to the base game:

  • Brand new "King's Campaign" with new starting options and campaign goals.
  • Play as a King with focus on diplomacy and managing your vassal lords.
  • Multiple improvements to the system for controlling vassal lords.
  • Reworked kingdoms economic, diplomatic and vassal lord relations systems.
  • New Main menu complete with reworked interface and new visuals.
  • New loading screens and other visual and asset updates.
  • Updated cinematics and starting quests to introduce you to the campaign.
  • New music including menu, war and peace tracks to get your Royal Blood pumping.

data.short_description: Only those of Royal Blood can undertake the King’s Campaign. Defend your mighty nation from enemies near and far, build your towns and cities into imgrenable bastions and economic powerhouses, and expand your realm by claiming all that is yours by right of your royal blood.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 670 / Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
